Title: Cam Newton calls Patriots coach Bill Belichick 'most misunderstood person' in sports
Description: Quarterback Cam Newton spent the 2020 NFL season with the New England Patriots, and he would like to return in 2021. What he experienced with coach Bill Belichick is a big reason why. "I think Bill Belichick is the most misunderstood person in all of sports.
Author: ESPN
